title: The Age of Beginnings
body:
Timeline

  • BX-WINTER-X: Slaying of a Dommahound: Krawul Asendikaal (ancestor of Callot Asendikaal) slays a Dommahound. It is recorded in a surviving personal account, but no exact date is known other than it taking place during a cold period (presumably winter).
  • B4-35-X: Founding of Mutasaih: Mutasaih becomes City of Trade
  • B3-80-X: Primitive Mutasaian Town Destroyed: Rogue tribes destroyed Proto-Mutasaih.
  • B3-55-X: Primitive Mutasaian Town Created: Smaller settlments converge to create Proto-Mutasaih.
  • B3-51-X: The Ussurian Spiritual Canon is created: The newly formed Temple Collective outline the protocols and procedures of the Council of Twelve, marking the first decree of many that would ultimately become the Ussurian Spiritual Canon.
  • B3-51-X: The Temple Collective is formed: Following the popularity of the Alkaasuru, Borna Glorsai receives Fenraye Huddah's blessing to assume the role of governor of Spiritual affairs. To prevent accusations of dictatorial leadership, Borna creates the Council of Twelve, whereupon each of the newly built temples would provide a representative Ren-Luzzo to vote upon Spiritual matters.
  • B3-51-X: Founding of Ussuru: Alkaasuru brings many settlers and Ussuru becomes an established City, later to be named Ussur.
  • B3-50-X: Alkaasuru is built: Borna Glorsai begins cinstruction of Ussur's temple, Alkaasuru, aided by thousands of willing hands, eager to learn of the Spirits after the downfall of the Mants.
  • B3-0-X: Fenraye Huddah Builds Altagoran: Fenraye Huddah bulds the first temple in Altaglake
